form.name: aspnetForm

div.h1: Changes to Grab and Go Meals April 6

div.p: Starting Monday, April 6, we will begin providing our Grab and Go meal service ONE day a week from 10:45 a.m. - 1:00 p.m. on Mondays. Students will receive five days worth of meals. The Van Wert pick-up location has changed to Van Wert Middle School door #M36. The Ohio City location remains the same at the Ohio City Village Hall/Utility Office (North door of the council chambers). For those interested and have not already done so, please click here to complete the pre-order form.

span.p: Starting Monday, April 6, we will begin providing our Grab and Go meal service ONE day a week from 10:45 a.m. - 1:00 p.m. on Mondays. Students will receive five days worth of meals. The Van Wert pick-up location has changed to Van Wert Middle School door #M36. The Ohio City location remains the same at the Ohio City Village Hall/Utility Office (North door of the council chambers). For those interested and have not already done so, please click here to complete the pre-order form.
VWCS will remain closed until May 1 as ordered by Governor Mike DeWine. Please continue to check the website, VWCS app, Facebook and Twitter for updates.

a.span: VWMS Assignment Pick-Up and D.C. Fundraiser Drop-Off

h2.span: MISSION OF VAN WERT CITY SCHOOLS

p.em: Van Wert City Schools will continue to be a source of Cougar Pride while providing each student a quality education through innovative instructional methods and technology.
